text:
@Lorrain22492203 ALMOST every meal cooked here and I have a reputation based on take out.  (Our kid used to complain about all the styrofoam clamshell containers in the fridge.)

Thing is, COVID-19 isn’t transmitted via food, but it CAN stay on inside of containers, boxes, bags, etc.
